name: Don't look down (itch) (Splyze)
description:
Under the download files you will find:

1. DontLookDown_Build.rar

This is a rar file containing a executable running a playable little prototype game utilising the hex grid. 

It is a 1v1 local Co-Op game (RED uses WASD and PURPLE uses arrow keys) where 2 players try to survive the longest in an ever-decaying world. Touching a hex tile will remove 1 life from the tile and if a player is no longer on top of a tile he will fall to his death. 

2. DontLookDown_Project.rar

Here you can find the entire unity project, containing the source code, custom editor window code and all that good stuff.
